blog.confluent.io/2015/04/bottled-water-.title: Bottled Water: Real-time integration of PostgreSQL and Kafka...
blog.confluent.io/2015/04/bottled-water-.snippet: It lets you transform your PostgreSQL database into a stream of structured Kafka events. This is tremendously useful for data integration. Writing to a database is easy, but getting the data out again is surprisingly hard.
